directions: Combine chicken broth, lentils, sausage, cumin, chili powder, and turmeric in a large pot; bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer until the lentils are tender, 15 to 20 minutes.
Stir mushrooms into the broth mixture; continue cooking until the mushrooms are tender, about 10 minutes more.
ingredients: 4 andouille sausage links, cut into cubes
2 (10 ounce) packages cremini mushrooms, coarsely chopped
title: Andouille, Mushroom, and Lentil Soup
